item.title: Solayer introduces the cross-chain bridge sBridge, supporting the connection of Solana to InfiniSVM and other SVM chains
item.description: On August 27th, the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM) Solayer declared the initiation of a cross-chain bridge named sBridge featuring a dedicated SVM semantics. Both SOON and Sonic have provided support for sBridge. sBridge directly links Solana to InfiniSVM and other SVM chains, facilitating seamless real-time liquidity and asset transfers without the necessity of going through EVM detours.In contrast to existing multi-chain solutions, sBridge is specifically optimized for the SVM chain, eliminating the conversion layer. This cross-chain bridge offers native PDA proof and hardware-accelerated ED25519 signatures, enabling the transfer of data and value at the actual speed of the SVM.

item.title: WLFI Lockbox Contract has received a deposit of 13.35 billion tokens, worth 3.5 billion dollars
item.description: On August 27th, as per on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), it has been under surveillance that there are already 13.35 billion tokens within the WLFI Lockbox contract, with a value of 3.5 billion U.S. dollars.Based on the current price of the WLFI contract at $0.2615, the book return rate of the investors in the first public offering round remains 16.43 times, and that of the second round is still 4.23 times.In addition, perhaps due to the influence of the XPL hedge-snipe incident, the Hyperliquid WLFI open interest (OI) has decreased by 49% in the past 24 hours, and even Binance has dropped by 5.75%.

item.title: Stat: XPL Price Manipulation by 4 Whale Addresses Resulted in a Total Profit of $47.67 Million
item.description: On August 27th, according to the analysis of Spot On Chain, four whale addresses manipulated the price of the XPL token on the Hyperliquid platform and earned a total profit of $47.67 million. The details are as follows:The 0xb9c (main coordinator) made a profit of +$15.11 million;The 0xe41 made a profit of +$12.97 million;The 0x006 made a profit of +$10.52 million;The 0x894 made a profit of +$9.07 million;The losses of the victims are:The 0xC2Cb suffered a loss of -$4.59 million;The 0x64a4 suffered a loss of -$2.00 million.

item.title: Guotai Junan Securities Response to Ant Group: Acquisition of Equity Stake Rumors for Virtual Asset Trading Platform License Application: Please refer to the official announcement
item.description: August 27th. In terms of Ye Mao-lin's plan, where he is the chairman of the Hong Kong-listed securities firm Bright Smart Securities and intends to sell all 50.55% of the company's shares to Ant Group. The CEO of the company, Ivan Ko Yak-Pun, responded by stating that the transaction is moving forward as scheduled. The company will disclose the progress on a monthly basis as required. There have been various rumors in the market, but it is emphasized that all information should be based on official announcements.In addition, regarding the market speculation that Ant's acquisition of Bright Smart is for the purpose of applying for a virtual asset trading platform license, Ivan Ko Yak-Pun further added that the current relationship between the company and Ant is only that of an offeror and an offeree. However, they are closely observing market developments and will conduct further research to consider whether to upgrade the existing license to a virtual asset license. (Oriental Daily N

item.title: Japanese financial firm Monex Group is considering launching a stablecoin pegged to the Japanese Yen.
item.description: On August 27th, the Tokyo-listed financial services company Monex Group announced that it is giving consideration to launching a yen-pegged stablecoin. As per Monex Group, this proposed yen-pegged stablecoin will be backed by assets such as Japanese government bonds and will be exchangeable for yen on a 1:1 basis. Its potential areas of application encompass cross-border remittances and corporate settlements.Monex Group, which holds the Japanese cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck and operates a domestic brokerage business, intends to progress the stablecoin project by leveraging these two major business segments.

item.title: Binance Wallet to Launch Mitosis (MITO) TGE
item.description: August 27th. According to official information, the Binance Wallet is set to launch the TGE (Initial Token Offering) of the Mitosis (MITO) token from 8:00 PM to 10:00 PM on August 28th, 2025. Users will be required to utilize Alpha points to participate in the subscription. The trading of the token contract will commence at 10:30 PM on the same day. Details of the TGE and the event page will be made available shortly.

item.title: Digital Asset Acquisition Company CSLM Raises $200 Million through IPO, Plans to Pursue Blockchain Merger for Strategic Listing
item.description: On August 27th, a newly established special purpose acquisition company named CSLM Digital Asset Acquisition raised $200 million through an initial public offering. The related stocks are anticipated to be traded on the Nasdaq Stock Exchange under the tickers "KOYN" and "KOYNW".The company declared that it will aim to merge with enterprises that are strategically associated with blockchain and distributed ledger technology. These include infrastructure for constructing wallets, custody solutions, trading platforms, data protocols, and tokenized financial instruments. Additionally, it will merge with companies developing applications such as payments, decentralized finance, and cross-border finance.

item.title: Ethereum PoS Network's ETH Staking Queue Surpasses 1 Million, Setting a New All-Time High
item.description: On August 27th, based on the data from the Validator Queue tracking website validatorqueue, the current exit queue of the Ethereum PoS network has risen to 1,012,296 ETH, which is approximately worth $46.66 billion. The withdrawal delay has been extended to 17 days and 14 hours.Meanwhile, around 581,233 ETH are queued to join the network.Previously reported, this situation reflects two opposing forces in the market. On one hand, some stakers may have decided to cash out after Ethereum's significant increase since the April low, resulting in a surge in the exit queue. On the other hand, new inflows of funds driven by regulatory optimism and institutional demand are also raising the entry queue. Listed companies such as SharpLink Gaming and BitMine Immersion have increased their ETH holdings and are engaging in staking.

item.title: A whale address is slowly accumulating the Bonk ecosystem's Governance and Propaganda (GP) token, amassing over $480,000 worth of GP in less than a month.
item.description: On August 27th, as per the on-chain analytics platform Stalkchain, a wallet received a fund inflow of $249,000 22 days ago and has been continuously purchasing the Bonk ecosystem development protocol GP token. A few days later, within 16 days, this wallet withdrew $843,000 from Binance. During this period, it has been gradually accumulating GP. Currently, the wallet has accumulated tokens worth approximately $481,200.

item.title: A certain new address deposited 2.59 million USDC and went long on XPL with 1x leverage.
item.description: On August 27th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a newly established wallet deposited 2.59 million USDC into HyperLiquid and initiated a 1x leverage XPL long position.
